channel.title: github on Letters From Iman
channel.description: Recent content in github on Letters From Iman

item.title: The Evolutions of Git Commit Message Conventions in Kurio
item.description: We in Kurio use Github as our version control system. And because of that, we also have a flow like open source project does.

item.title: Today I Learned - Checkout to Pull Request in GitHub Public Repository
item.description: So today I learned a really important thing in Github and open-source world :D.

item.title: My First Impression about Code Review
item.description: My first time to know about Code Review is when entering my current company at Kurio.

item.title: Why You Should Care About Squash and Merge in Git
item.description: We just develop our new feature in Kurio. It is a targeted push notification.
